remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項嘗試切換編輯、 插入和唯讀模式之間，但在模式會實際變更之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，以執行自訂的常式，例如設定控制特定的模式，或取消模式變更時就會發生此事件。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷要模式將要變更的控制項，以判斷是否因為使用者取消編輯或插入而引發事件作業，或指出應該取消模式變更。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is changing, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation, or to indicate that the mode change should be canceled. 若要判斷新的模式，請使用屬性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 您也可以使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定替代模式，以將它設定為其中一個來變更列舉值。You can also use the property to programmatically specify an alternate mode to which to change by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用屬性來判斷是否已為使用者取消編輯結果引發這個事件，或插入作業。Use the property to determine whether this event was raised as the result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation. 若要取消模式變更，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the mode change, set the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便事件，以隱藏頁面巡覽區資料列時控制轉換至編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
